description: This NPP covers a requirement amongst the PSIB Stream from product categories 1-2-5 and contains products that are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA). PSPC has a requirement for the purchase of office furniture to Gatineau, Quebec (Hill) for delivery and installation between 2024/03/04 and 2024/05/04.There is no security requirement associated with the requirement.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information

*   **Title and Contract Number**: EN439-240535 LTDLC Phase 1A.2 - Workspaces, CAT 1-2-5 PSIB
*   **Reference Number**: WS4204123284-Doc4220392011
*   **Publication Date**: September 19, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: October 19, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the purchase of office furniture to be delivered and installed at Gatineau, Quebec (Hull). The products required are categorized under 1-2-5 PSIB Stream and are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA). The estimated delivery and installation period is between March 4, 2024, and May 4, 2024. This tender does not require a security requirement.

#### Tendering Details

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: None
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information**: Nancy Sell, nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Access to Tender Information

Access to the tender information can be found through the Ariba platform or the URL https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17491815. Prospective bidders must register for an account to access the tender documents and information.  #### Award Criteria

*   This tender will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

#### Contact

For any queries, please contact Nancy Sell at nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
